this film was truly a game changer in

the industry standard following this

the numerous prehistoric creatures

models stop-motion animation traveling
mats and miniature rear projections all
these tactics were painstakingly
difficult at the time despite how they
may appear to us now almost
90 years later the iconic fight scene

seven weeks to be completed it combined
live actors and stop motion plus actress

to spend 22 hours sitting in a fake tree
acting out her observation and reaction
of the dino gorilla duel

jurassic park the first installment in
the wildly popular film franchise based
on michael crichton's novel of the same
name it follows paleontologist duo alan
grant and ellie sadler who are among a
select group chosen to tour an iowan
theme park populated by dinosaurs
created from prehistoric dna the park's
mastermind billionaire john hammond
assures everyone that the park is safe
however that riled up t-rex and the herd
of pete velaza raptors who can unlock
doors aren't really selling this whole
park is safe notion now are they john oh
and who could forget the mathematician
ian malcolm played by jeff goldblum who
specializes in chaos theory and the
physics behind using as few shirt
buttons as possible the true magic of
this picture cannot be easily summarized

breathtaking scenery much of which was
